Alliance of Rainforest

1 day 4 forests exploration

Where do we operate?

We operate between 3000ft â€“ 6000ft above sea level at 3 strategic forests types we call the Alliance of Rainforests

FASHION FOREST

RWG Awana (aka Upper Dipterocarp Forests, 3000FT ASL)

SKY FOREST

Chin Swee Temple (aka Montane Oak Forests, 4500FT ASL)

CHOCOLATE FOREST

Genting Highlands (aka Montane Ericaceous Forests, 6000FT ASL)

SKYRIDE FOREST

RWG Awana-Genting Highlands (3000FT-6000FT ASL)

Itinerary

Transfer to the Fashion Forest
9.00AM
Walk at the Fashion Forest
10.30AM
Transfer to Genting Skyway

Free & easy at First World & lunch
2.00PM

3.30PM

4.00PM
Tour at Sky Forest
5.00PM
